What do to: Read "the" book (if you have two weeks spare time)
Read this book (if you have two hours spare time)
Read this capter (if you have ten minutes spare time)
Go to RStudio, Choose *File > New Project > Version Control*
Paste the URL of the Github repository you want to sync to your computer, eg., <git@github.com:Bia-Ka/StudentGuide2R.git>
